name: SAMSUNG Galaxy S20 FE 5G (8GB RAM, 128GB, Cloud Mint)

prod_desc.heading: Why buy Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G
features: Octa-Core Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 Processor lets you install and run multiple apps
128GB Storage lets you store your files with ease
Triple Rear Camera with a single front camera to capture your moments
6.5” FHD Plus Super AMOLED Infinity-O Display is more immersive than ever
sub_features: Buy Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G online, which flaunts an amazing display, brilliant camera, and powerful processor. Available in classic colours it flaunts a stylish design that is easy to hold and is crafted for perfect grip. Rated IP68 for water and dust resistance, this phone stands up to 150 cm of water for up to 30 minutes. The smartphone features a striking screen that gives you a 6.5” FHD Plus Super AMOLED Infinity-O Display. The resolution is 1080 x 2400 pixels. It enables you to view more and get an immersive experience. Now you can see and do more of what you love, without interruption. Twice as fast as many smartphone screens, the Super AMOLED display refreshes at a super smooth 120 Hz rate to keep action clear and touch response fast.

The Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G features storage of 128GB that lets you store files with ease. It comes with Micro SD Card support, expandable up to 1TB. This smartphone runs on the Android 12 operating system. With advanced technology like Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Hall Sensor, RGB Light Sensor, Virtual Proximity Sensor, the smartphone can stand up in style. Its 4500 mAh lithium-ion battery is perfect for continuous working as long as you don't give up because it certainly won't. This All-Day Intelligent Battery helps you to play for hours on end. It features Octa-Core Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 Processor, so you can play hi-end games or run heavy files and carry out tasks without worrying about the performance.

Loaded with so many specifications, the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G’s price is kept reasonable. The upgraded CPU ensures a seamless response time, allowing you to multitask, play games or run any heavy task without worrying about the operation speed. With 8GB RAM, you can install multiple applications and run them all together without disturbing the speed of the phone. It comes with 5G support. It flaunts a brilliant camera combination of 12 MP (ultra-wide camera), 12 MP (wide-angle camera), and 8 MP (telephoto camera). It takes awesome shots. It comes with camera features like 30X Space Zoom, 3X Optical zoom, Single Take, Live Focus, Pro Mode, Night Mode, Super steady, Night Hyperlapse, My Filter, Highlight Reel, Quick Share. The video features are Live focus videos, Super steady, Real-time camera switch, Front and back conversion 4K UHD recording, HDR 10+ recording, Super slow-mo 960 fps at HD. The 32 MP front camera offers natural clarity, delivering stunning selfies. Be the star of the shot and enjoy more detail in your photos and videos. So, what are you waiting for? Purchase the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G online, right now!

features.title: Camera
features.desc: 12 MP + 12 MP + 8 MP Triple Rear & 32 MP Front Camera

faqs.que: What is unique about Samsung phones?
faqs.ans: Galaxy devices leverage crisp, expansive screens to give users a variety of options for working across multiple apps. Samsung smartphones have featured Multi Window mode as far back as 2012's Galaxy Note II, and each subsequent generation has further refined the multitasking experience

faqs.que: Why are Samsung phones better than other brands?
faqs.ans: Samsung has the most expansive customer support and repair service network among all other Android OEMs. It also offers some of the best trade-in values in the mobile industry, allowing many of us to upgrade to newer devices more often than we would if choosing a different brand

faqs.que: Can I upgrade any Samsung Mobile Device?
faqs.ans: No. You must purchase an eligible Samsung smartphone device and opt-in to the Samsung Upgrade Program at checkout using an approved Samsung Financing Account.

faqs.que: How many years can a Samsung last?
faqs.ans: The lifetime of smartphones like Samsung and iPhone is much longer than smaller brands. Here is a breakdown of the average mobile life according to the different brands: iPhone - four to eight years. Samsung - three to six years.
